channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox on the road, 15th December
item.description:
There is a dead fox on the road as of 12:10am.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Wickham Street, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal and obstructive Customer Parking allowed by The Bell PUB, 14th December
item.description:
The Bell Pub continuously allows customers to Park illegally on double yellow no stopping restrictions on a daily basis causing dangerous and obstructive conditions for other road users. This unacceptable to continue to allow the owners of this Pub to flaunt the laws in place surrounding Car Parking just to line their Greed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Lane, Perry Vale, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter everywhere on Woolwich Road, 14th December
item.description:
Hi there, Woolwich road has not been cleaned close to a month now - this is unacceptable, please clean that road this week. Best, Lidia

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fearon Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another Dog Poo on the driveway of 4d Goulton Road, E5 8HA, 14th December
item.description:
Once again, the same offender who lives in Althlone Close flats, E5 8HD and has been reported previously still continues to leave his dog poo behind. Hackney Council has failed to deal with this yet again.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Goulton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green paint spillage, 14th December
item.description:
There is a large spillage of green paint by the kerbside (see photos). This happened about three days ago. It seems to be quite set and will need diluting and removing. Someone has now driven through it and it is starting to be spread across the road surface.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Cameron Road, Hayes, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping under A2 Bridge - Angerstein Roundabout, 14th December
item.description:
Hi there, There is a massive fly-tipping dump area underneath the bridge as per attached photo. Please address this asap. Also the areas around the roundabout requires frequent cleaning a few times a week, which does not seem to be happening atm. Best, Lidia

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fearon Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black Toyota, 14th December
item.description:
Car has been dumped underneath the building of the flats at Morvale Close. It’s taking up two parking spaces.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Morvale Close, Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burst pipes within flat, 14th December
item.description:
We had booked in a repair for our kitchen pipes, a worker came in and "fixed" it, a FEW DAYS later, the pipes burst open and flooded our shelf and kitchen. This is NOT acceptable.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Frampton Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and leaves, 14th December
item.description:
Litter and leaves altogether along gutters and pavement from corner of Selby Road and penge road up to and beyond 47 Selby. Includes plastic bottles. Litter pickers missed this last week and left it for the weekend for us to enjoy as we walked by

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Penge Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle believed to be abandoned, 14th December
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned for 3weeks no occupants have been to this vehicle. I have investigated the status of this vehicle and it states it’s uninsured and no valid MOT (expired September 2025). However vehicle is taxed September 2025 just before MOT expired . The vehicle is abandoned on Eversley Cross DA7 situated in the bays right by the bridge. Leading to Eversley Avenue junction. Vehicle is a white Vauxhall Astra GTI with personalisation. The number plate CF16 BZE.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eversley Cross, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 / SE24 between the north end, 14th December
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 / SE24 between the north end of Lairdale Estate and Peabody Cottages, Peabody Estate Rosendale Road SE24 and more specifically between Lambeth streetlight columns ID numbered 77 and 78 is a brown painted brick wall under an over bridge. Said wall graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin, picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4467013,-0.0994835,3a,60.3y,248.55h,74.28t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sGZ9Ph8judQYAymDQFx9DQQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D15.721309670764313%26panoid%3DGZ9Ph8judQYAymDQFx9DQQ%26yaw%3D248.54865237234415!7i13312!8i6656?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwOS4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22-23, Burrow Walk, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 re Rosendale Playing Fields nort, 14th December
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 re Rosendale Playing Fields north entrance ie opposite side of the road to house number 211. Enamel type sign attached to the fence tagged. (Kindly NB this is a new report ie not repeating your ref.:478804 which was actioned.) Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin, picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/ maps/ @51.4441859,-0.0978304,3a,75y,66.2h,86t/ data=!3m8!1e1!3m6!1snFXNA6mmWYT8pebLZ3g7tA!2e0!5s20220801T000000!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D4.0042677033708%26panoid%3DnFXNA6mmWYT8pebLZ3g7tA%26yaw%3D66.20000980727642!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTExNi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
